thread.title: Police on the hunt for Durban acid attack killer
thread.title_full: Police on the hunt for Durban acid attack killer | News24

author: news24.com
title: Police on the hunt for Durban acid attack killer
text:
Durban - A manhunt is underway after a Durban woman and her nephew died when acid was thrown on them while they were sleeping.
KwaZulu-Natal police said Ntokozo Sobahle Nzuza, 34, and her 4-year-old nephew Mlungisi Ngongoma were attacked by an unknown suspect on July 30.
They were sleeping in an apartment along Mansel Road, just off Umgeni Road in Durban at the time, spokesperson Major Thulani Zwane said.
They sustained serious injuries and were taken to hospital.
